tasks.title: **Upgrade** Centralize analytics ingest: write summarized metrics into `education_central.db` when a
tasks.description: **Upgrade** Centralize analytics ingest: write summarized metrics into `education_central.db` when apps save results; stop dashboard queries from reaching directly into per-app DBs.

tasks.title: **Upgrade** Replace hard-coded hosts/ports (`100.112.58.92`, etc.) with env/config plus `url_for`, a
tasks.description: **Upgrade** Replace hard-coded hosts/ports (`100.112.58.92`, etc.) with env/config plus `url_for`, and surface one config object used by templates/JS.

tasks.title: **Upgrade** Propagate authenticated users: when Google OAuth completes, create/sync the user across
tasks.description: **Upgrade** Propagate authenticated users: when Google OAuth completes, create/sync the user across per-app DBs and store a shared cookie/session so apps can attribute results.

tasks.title: **Upgrade** Persist user identity consistently: reuse the unified session (or a shared cookie) inste
tasks.description: **Upgrade** Persist user identity consistently: reuse the unified session (or a shared cookie) instead of regenerating a random secret per process that invalidates sessions.

tasks.description: **Upgrade** Capture per-note timing and mistakes as a first-class table to enable analytics and feedback in the dashboard.
